member.name: M:Hyprsoft.Webhooks.Server.Web.V1.Controllers.ApiController.BuildInfo
member.summary: Gets the UTC build date and the version of the Webhooks Server API.
member.returns: The UTC build date and the version of the Webhooks Server API.

member.name: M:Hyprsoft.Webhooks.Server.Web.V1.Controllers.ApiController.Health(System.TimeSpan)
member.summary: Gets a health summary of the Webhooks Server API.
member.returns: A health summary of the Webhooks Server API.

member.name: M:Hyprsoft.Webhooks.Server.Web.V1.Controllers.ApiController.Subscriptions
member.summary: Gets a list of the current webhooks event subscriptions and their endpoints.
member.returns: A list of the current webhooks event subscriptions and their endpoints.

member.name: M:Hyprsoft.Webhooks.Server.Web.V1.Controllers.WebhooksController.Subscribe(Hyprsoft.Webhooks.Client.SubscriptionRequest)
member.returns: A webhook response indicating success or failure and the reason for the failure if applicable.

member.name: M:Hyprsoft.Webhooks.Server.Web.V1.Controllers.WebhooksController.Unsubscribe(Hyprsoft.Webhooks.Client.SubscriptionRequest)
member.returns: A webhook response indicating success or failure and the reason for the failure if applicable.

member.name: M:Hyprsoft.Webhooks.Server.Web.V1.Controllers.WebhooksController.Publish(Hyprsoft.Webhooks.Events.WebhookEvent)
member.summary: Publishes a webhook event to all subscribers.
